Hello, world.|

This is a simple, light-weight boilerplate for getting you started quickly with your next #webdev 👩‍💻 project.

The idea is to enable you to dive right in on a project idea without having to worry about anything else, yet with all the essential #DX 👌🏽 features, such as hot reloading and optimized production builds.

To get started, simply start editing this index.html file, while using #TailwindCSS to add some 💅🏿 gloss.

You don't have to use any framework, but if you fancy #ReactJS , you can get started by running yarn setup:react and uncommenting the starter code in index.js and app.js.

Now go and build something. 💪
